alert.note: Alert for Morris; Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:52PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morris and south central Sussex Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andover, or near Newton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Hopatcong, Kinnelon, Butler, Wharton, Rockaway, Mount Arlington, Stanhope, Netcong, Victory Gardens, Andover, Lake Mohawk, Greendell, Lake Telemark, Green Pond, Succasunna-Kenvil, Budd Lake and White Meadow Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in New Jersey between mile markers 24 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern and northwestern New Jersey.
